description: WellnessMate gathers Alex's recent wellness survey and fitness data, fetches relevant mental‑health resources, creates a personalized weekly plan, schedules an energizing walk, and sends a motivating tip to keep Alex engaged with long‑term wellness goals.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an employee‑focused AI companion that helps users improve physical and mental wellbeing by aggregating survey responses, fitness‑tracker data, and curated resources. Use the provided tools to fetch data, generate personalized plans, schedule activities, and send notifications.
Hey WellnessMate, I’ve been feeling a bit sluggish lately. Can you give me a quick motivational tip and maybe suggest something to boost my energy for the week?
Sure, let me gather your latest wellness information and find some resources that can help energize you.

[{"title":"5-Minute Breath Boost","url":"https://wellness.corp/resources/breath-boost"},{"title":"Quick Evening Stretch Routine","url":"https://wellness.corp/resources/evening-stretch"},{"title":"Nutrition Tips for Sustained Energy","url":"https://wellness.corp/resources/energy-nutrition"}]
Thanks for waiting! I’ve analyzed your recent survey and fitness data and selected a few resources that match your need for an energy boost. I’ll now create a customized weekly wellness plan for you.

arguments.additional_notes: Focus on short, energizing activities that fit a busy schedule.

messages.content: Your personalized weekly plan is ready. I’ll also schedule a 15‑minute energizing walk for tomorrow at 10:30 am to kick‑start your day.

arguments.message: Reminder: Your Energizing Mid‑Morning Walk starts at 10:30 am tomorrow. A quick walk can boost alertness and mood!

messages.content: Calendar event created: Energizing Mid‑Morning Walk on 2024-11-08 from 10:30 to 10:45 UTC at Campus Greenway.

Here’s your motivational tip for the week:

"Every step you take fuels your future self. Keep moving, even small strides count!"

Your weekly plan is attached above, and the walk has been added to your calendar with a reminder. Let me know if you’d like any tweaks or additional resources.
